subject: Re: [junit] how to write JUnit test for JMS
msgSnippet: ... The book _JUnit Recipes_ can offer you some help here. As for your first test, answer two questions: 1. How do you send a message? What has to happen in
messageBody:
sanjaykharwar2002 wrote:
> hi everyone,
>
> I am new for JUnit test. I am trying to write JUnit test for JMS,
> but i have no idea how to start it.If you have any example or anything
> regarding it, please post it. Please help me.

The book _JUnit Recipes_ can offer you some help here. As for your first
test, answer two questions:

1. How do you send a message? What has to happen in your application to
send a message?

2. How can you tell that the message was successfully processed?

Pick one scenario and answer those two questions, then you have your
first test.

Good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
